name: The Stick
description:
Short game made for VR Jam 2020

Your caveman friend broke his favorite ritual mask, and you gotta help him to make a new one using only stick. Transform ugly clay puddle into your beautiful creation.

This is more like glorified creative tool, rather than actual game.

This game uses SteamVR, so should be compatible with any headset that it supports.

---

All of the models (Except stock Quixel rocks and base model for Caveman) were modelled just for this game. (And i kinda screwed with balancing between asset creation and gameplay creation)

Tools used:

  • Adobe Fuse (Caveman model)
  • Blender (Mesh models)
  • Substance painter (Texture map generation)
  • Mixamo (Animations)
  • Unity 3D (Engine)
  • Universal Rendering Pipeline
